name: BasilNet
description: Docker-based home media server stack with 15+ services including Plex, Sonarr, Radarr, qBittorrent with Gluetun VPN, and Home Assistant integrations.

name: Hydroponic Farm Controller
description: Automated hydroponic system with ESP32 microcontrollers, pH/EC sensors, and a custom React dashboard for monitoring plant health.

name: AI Health Monitor
description: Patent-pending AI-powered health monitoring system using computer vision and machine learning for early symptom detection.

name: LR Paris Sales Tools
description: Internal proposal generation tools and HubSpot/Asana integrations for luxury corporate gifting workflows.

name: Custom Film Camera
description: 3D-printed medium format camera with custom electronics and exposure metering system.

name: June Virtual Secretary
description: AI-powered virtual assistant for scheduling and task management, built with Node.js and natural language processing.
